name: itmemory
title: Tab Memory Usage
description: Tab Memory Usage displays the amount of memory is used by each tab
author: Jeremy Schomery

preferences.name: position
preferences.title: Memory report position:
preferences.description: This is where memory report is positioned on tab relative to the title

preferences.name: delimiter
preferences.title: Memory report delimiter:
preferences.description: This symbol is used to separate memory report from title
If you usually have many open tabs, prolong the time interval.
preferences.name: delay
preferences.title: Minimum time interval between memory calculations for a single tab (in seconds):

preferences.name: exceptions
preferences.title: Exception list (comma separated):
preferences.description: Do not append memory usage to the tabs with URLs matching this list. Memory usage is appended to the title of each document. Some websites use this title later to generate a new title. This will cause accumulation of memory usage on the title bar.
After each upgrade by default the extension opens its welcome page to notify user about the recent changes
